General.Name: WCON Electronics (Guangdong) Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: WCON Electronics (Guangdong) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and marketing of connectors and cable assemblies in China. The company's product portfolio include board to board, wire to board, and I/O connectors; euro, barrier, and pluggable terminal blocks; wire harness/cable assemblies; and other connectors, such as IC sockets, LED series products, mini jumpers, SDC, and automotive connectors. Its products are used in industrial automation and control, automobile electronics, new energy vehicle, industrial cable assembly, and photovoltaic inverter system applications. The company also exports its products to Euro-American countries. WCON Electronics (Guangdong) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Dongguan, China.
